attributes.type: function (struct SortitionSumTreeFactory.SortitionSumTrees storage pointer,bytes32,bytes32) view returns (uint256)

appeal(uint256,bytes).details: Appeals the ruling of a specified dispute.

params._extraData: Additional info about the appeal. Not used by this contract.

appealCost(uint256,bytes).details: Gets the cost of appealing a specified dispute.

params._extraData: Additional info about the appeal. Not used by this contract.

appealPeriod(uint256).details: Gets the start and end of a specified dispute's current appeal period.
appealPeriod(uint256).return: start The start of the appeal period.end The end of the appeal period.

arbitrationCost(bytes).details: Gets the cost of arbitration in a specified subcourt.

params._extraData: Additional info about the dispute. We use it to pass the ID of the subcourt to create the dispute in (first 32 bytes) and the minimum number of jurors required (next 32 bytes).

castCommit(uint256,uint256[],bytes32).details: Sets the caller's commit for the specified votes. `O(n)` where `n` is the number of votes.

castVote(uint256,uint256[],uint256,uint2.details: Sets the caller's choices for the specified votes. `O(n)` where `n` is the number of votes.

params._salt: The salt for the commit if the votes were hidden.

params._governor: The new value for the `governor` storage variable.

params._maxDrawingTime: The new value for the `maxDrawingTime` storage variable.

params._minStakingTime: The new value for the `minStakingTime` storage variable.

params._pinakion: The new value for the `pinakion` storage variable.

params._RNGenerator: The new value for the `RNGenerator` storage variable.

changeSubcourtAlpha(uint96,uint256).details: Changes the `alpha` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._alpha: The new value for the `alpha` property value.

changeSubcourtJurorFee(uint96,uint256).details: Changes the `feeForJuror` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._feeForJuror: The new value for the `feeForJuror` property value.

changeSubcourtJurorsForJump(uint96,uint2.details: Changes the `jurorsForCourtJump` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._jurorsForCourtJump: The new value for the `jurorsForCourtJump` property value.

changeSubcourtMinStake(uint96,uint256).details: Changes the `minStake` property value of a specified subcourt. Don't set to a value lower than its parent's `minStake` property value.

params._minStake: The new value for the `minStake` property value.

changeSubcourtTimesPerPeriod(uint96,uint.details: Changes the `timesPerPeriod` property value of a specified subcourt.

params._timesPerPeriod: The new value for the `timesPerPeriod` property value.

createDispute(uint256,bytes).details: Creates a dispute. Must be called by the arbitrable contract.

params._extraData: Additional info about the dispute to be created. We use it to pass the ID of the subcourt to create the dispute in (first 32 bytes) and the minimum number of jurors required (next 32 bytes).
params._numberOfChoices: Number of choices to choose from in the dispute to be created.

createDispute(uint256,bytes).return: disputeID The ID of the created dispute.

createSubcourt(uint96,bool,uint256,uint2.details: Creates a subcourt under a specified parent court.

params._alpha: The `alpha` property value of the subcourt.
params._feeForJuror: The `feeForJuror` property value of the subcourt.
params._hiddenVotes: The `hiddenVotes` property value of the subcourt.
params._jurorsForCourtJump: The `jurorsForCourtJump` property value of the subcourt.
params._minStake: The `minStake` property value of the subcourt.
params._parent: The `parent` property value of the subcourt.
params._sortitionSumTreeK: The number of children per node of the subcourt's sortition sum tree.
params._timesPerPeriod: The `timesPerPeriod` property value of the subcourt.

currentRuling(uint256).details: Gets the current ruling of a specified dispute.

disputeStatus(uint256).details: Gets the status of a specified dispute.

drawJurors(uint256,uint256).details: Draws jurors for a dispute. Can be called in parts. `O(n * k * log_k(j))` where `n` is the number of iterations to run, `k` is the number of children per node of the dispute's court's sortition sum tree, and `j` is the maximum number of jurors that ever staked in it simultaneously.

params._iterations: The number of iterations to run.

execute(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Repartitions tokens and ETH for a specified appeal in a specified dispute. Can be called in parts. `O(i + u * n * (n + p * log_k(j)))` where `i` is the number of iterations to run, `u` is the number of jurors that need to be unstaked, `n` is the maximum number of subcourts one of these jurors has staked in, `p` is the depth of the subcourt tree, `k` is the minimum number of children per node of one of these subcourts' sortition sum tree, and `j` is the maximum number of jurors that ever staked in one of these subcourts simultaneously.

params._iterations: The number of iterations to run.

executeDelayedSetStakes(uint256).details: Executes the next delayed set stakes. `O(n)` where `n` is the number of iterations to run.

params._iterations: The number of delayed set stakes to execute.

executeGovernorProposal(address,uint256,.details: Lets the governor call anything on behalf of the contract.

params._amount: The value sent with the call.
params._data: The data sent with the call.

executeRuling(uint256).details: Executes a specified dispute's ruling. UNTRUSTED.

getDispute(uint256).details: Gets a specified dispute's non primitive properties.
getDispute(uint256).return: votesLengths The dispute's vote length.tokensAtStakePerJuror The dispute's required tokens at stake per Juror.totalFeesForJurors The dispute's total fees for Jurors.votesInEachRound The dispute's counter of votes made in each round.repartitionsInEachRound The dispute's counter of vote reward repartitions made in each round.penaltiesInEachRound The dispute's amount of tokens collected from penalties in each round. `O(a)` where `a` is the number of appeals of the dispute.

getJuror(address).details: Gets a specified juror's non primitive properties.
getJuror(address).return: subcourtIDs The juror's IDs of subcourts where the juror has stake path.

getSubcourt(uint96).details: Gets a specified subcourt's non primitive properties.
getSubcourt(uint96).return: children The subcourt's child court list.timesPerPeriod The subcourt's time per period.

getVote(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Gets a specified vote for a specified appeal in a specified dispute.
getVote(uint256,uint256,uint256).return: account The account for vote.commit  The commit for vote.choice  The choice for vote.voted True if the account voted, False otherwise.

getVoteCounter(uint256,uint256).details: Gets the vote counter for a specified appeal in a specified dispute. Note: This function is only to be used by the interface and it won't work if the number of choices is too high.
getVoteCounter(uint256,uint256).return: winningChoice The winning choice.counts The count.tied Whether the vote tied. `O(n)` where `n` is the number of choices of the dispute.

params._RNGenerator: The address of the random number generator contract.
params._alpha: The `alpha` property value of the general court.
params._feeForJuror: The `feeForJuror` property value of the general court.
params._hiddenVotes: The `hiddenVotes` property value of the general court.
params._jurorsForCourtJump: The `jurorsForCourtJump` property value of the general court.
params._maxDrawingTime: The maximum time that the drawing phase should last.
params._minStake: The `minStake` property value of the general court.
params._minStakingTime: The minimum time that the staking phase should last.
params._pinakion: The address of the token contract.
params._sortitionSumTreeK: The number of children per node of the general court's sortition sum tree.
params._timesPerPeriod: The `timesPerPeriod` property value of the general court.

onApprove(address,address,uint256).details: Notifies the controller about an approval allowing the controller to react if desired.
onApprove(address,address,uint256).return: allowed Whether the operation should be allowed or not.

onTransfer(address,address,uint256).details: Notifies the controller about a token transfer allowing the controller to react if desired.
onTransfer(address,address,uint256).return: allowed Whether the operation should be allowed or not.

passPeriod(uint256).details: Passes the period of a specified dispute.

proxyPayment(address).details: DEPRECATED. Called when `_owner` sends ETH to the Wrapped Token contract.

params._owner: The address that sent the ETH to create tokens.

proxyPayment(address).return: allowed Whether the operation should be allowed or not.

setStake(uint96,uint128).details: Sets the caller's stake in a subcourt.

stakeOf(address,uint96).details: Gets the stake of a specified juror in a specified subcourt.
